relic_pools.description: A collection of relic pools that define which collectable relics can appear in specific situations or rewards.

id.description: Unique identifier for this relic pool. Used to reference this pool from other parts of the game.

items.description: Reference to an relic's unique identifier that can appear in this pool (must be a collectable).

relics.description: List of relics references that can appear in this pool.

items.description: A relic pool definition that specifies which collectable  relics can appear together.
